crates/rpg-parser/src/paradigms/mod.rs:d.name: detect_paradigms_toml
semantic_features: detect active paradigms from project languages and rules

invokes:
paradigm_defs
        .iter()
        .filter(|def| {
            def.languages
                .iter()
                .any(|dl| languages.iter().any(|l| l.name() == dl))
        })
        .filter(|def| matches_detect_rules(root, &manifest, &def.detect))
        .collect
